alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Juab and western Tooele Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 513 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Utah Test and Training Range South to 6 miles north of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Clive and Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 28 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
